name: Vincent Garrigues
body:
### Me

I'm Vincent, an engineer in Berlin. I work at [SoundCloud](http://soundcloud.com).

### Follow me on

* [GitHub](http://github.com/vincentgarrigues)
* [Twitter](http://twitter.com/garriguv)

### What I do

Mobile things.

* Objective-C
* Scala
* Ruby

### Contact

Send me an email: vincent at soundcloud com

[Linkedin](http://lnkd.in/bmX68R)
